name: Gladiator Games
description:
The plot of the game is set in the period of ancient Rome in the time of 100 BC. The organization of gladiatorial games was typical for this period, when the most successful gladiators were awarded a wooden sword, symbolizing freedom. The main character finds himself in prison under a gladiatorial arena after a waste of night, where he is imprisoned and has to fight against other gladiators in order to earn his freedom. For each fight won, the player character receives coins for which he can improve his equipment or buy elixirs that help him in the fight.

CONTROLS AND ACTIONS
  • Move left -  A 
  • Move right - D
  • Jump - hold W
  • Buy - E
  • Talk - E
  • Attack - E
  • Block - hold SPACE
